import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./index.css" import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import Menu from "./ImagesMenu" const ImagesProject = () => { const [items, setItems] = useState(Menu) const filterItem=(cateItem)=>{ const updateItem = items.filter( (curEle)=>{ return curEle.category === cateItem } ) setItems(updateItem) } return ( <>

Order Your favourite dish

{ items.map((elem) => { const { id, name, image, description, price } = elem return ( <>
{/* for images */}
{/* menu items descriptions */}

{name}

{description}

{price}

Prices may On Selected Date.

) }) }
) } export default ImagesProject
